alert.note: Alert for Henderson; McDonough; Mercer; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:23PM CST until December 15 at 10:15PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CST FOR EASTERN HENDERSON...WARREN...MCDONOUGH AND MERCER COUNTIES... At 923 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Keithsburg to Bowen, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. A 58 mph wind gust was measured at the Keokuk Airport at 906 PM. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Galesburg, Macomb, Monmouth, Aledo, Bushnell, Burgess, Colchester, Roseville, Viola, Stronghurst, Avon, Millersburg, Matherville, Kirkwood, New Boston, Blandinsville, Sherrard, Keithsburg, Reynolds and Industry. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Illinois...and southeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
